body: I've been trying to get this series translated for months but it is alot of editing. Soon maybe

@mickeyj : Thanks for the explanation. Ah, didn't realize pay much attention on those kind of things related to the editing, and the averaging at 50 pages per volume aren't really like the usual "thin books"

@ minminazusa Hundreds of text boxes, many that are tall and narrow, background editing for the text without bubbles, and translating the moaning would double the workload upon the already many texts. But honestly, I might consider working on a low quality translation edit of this series if nothing is done for another half year.
@mickeyj : being unfamiliar with the translation space, what kind of editing (I’m assuming graphic, like redraws) are needed on this one that makes it difficult?
Always bums me out seeing this series. It's SO GOOD but it requires so much fucking editing and translating. Unless a team works on this, it's gonna take a while to see this in English
We need a part with more chieftain on it.

p11 got interesting part. The village chief said "You sure have grown, I almost didn't recognize you at first" and he answered "did you mistake me for someone else". It kind of implied he already has a relationship with the village before. Anyway, Silva being all lonely when watching him fuck other girls is really cute (still only thought it's because of the sex tattoo though). Just hope he took her as someone special too.

...erotic trap dungeon ^^; So, that orb he stole from the village, the Elf's secret treasure, is actually present from king of humans as proof of friendship with the many elf tribes. It has great power if used by the Chosen One. But many elves has gone, and the treasure is forgotten; the chief even forgot they had an orb hidden in a dungeon in their basement. They made a deal, the village will support him in gathering the treasures from all tribes (+ Silva as his companion in the quest). In exchange, he will help impregnate the elves. Elves had been declining, and with weakening magic element pool, they don't get pregnant easily. His sperm which got high quantity of magic element might work. Silva is feeling lonely though :D | Still curious of his feeling to Silva, I hope he does have a feeling for her. And no development about him being from isekai.
Amazing. Wish there is more content on the elf leader
